attr.title: Outrider Mako
attr.desc: Take on the role of Mako on her quest to seek out and subsequently deliver her, uh, deliverables in this top-down view 2D action game. Jump on top of your enemies and slime them with goo to stop them in their tracks! Get those deliverables delivered!
attr.inst: Copy all game data to `outridermako/assets`. Requires GMToolkit runtime.
